welcome_benefits: Get a SpiceJet flight voucher worth Rs. 4,000 and complimentary Spiceclub Gold membership.

Movie & Dining: Get up to 20% discount on dining at several participating restaurants.
Rewards Rate: 28 Spiceclub Points on every Rs. 200 spent on SpiceJet mobile app/website, 12 Spiceclub points on online entertainment, food order, & online bill payments, and 6 Spiceclub points on all other transactions.
Reward Redemption: The earned Spiceclub Points can be redeemed against flight tickets, meal vouchers, etc, via the SpiceJet website or mobile app. 1 Spiceclub Point is equivalent to Re. 0.5.
Travel: Complimentary access to domestic airport lounges.
Domestic Lounge Access: 8 complimentary domestic lounge access every year.

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on all fuel transactions between Rs. 400 and Rs. 4,000.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Amount Withdrawn Subject to a Minimum Charge of ₹500

product_details: Get a SpiceJet flight voucher worth Rs. 4,000 as a welcome benefit.
Complimentary SpiceClub Gold membership on card approval.
Earn up to 28 Spiceclub Points on every spend of Rs. 200.
Earn up to 8,000 bonus Reward Points every year on achieving the milestone spend.
Get complimentary domestic lounge access every year.
Get 2,000 bonus points every year as a renewal benefit.
1% fuel surcharge waiver on all fuel transactions.
